Get in Touch

Have a question about our services? Want to discuss a custom project? We're here to help!

Business Hours

We're available during regular business hours for phone calls and in-person consultations. Email inquiries are answered within 24 hours.

Monday - Friday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Saturday 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM
Sunday Closed

Response Times

  • Phone: Immediate during business hours
  • Email: Within 24 hours
  • Quote Requests: Within 24 hours
  • Rush Projects: Same day response

Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions about our services

What's your minimum order?

Our minimum order is 6 items for most services. This low minimum makes us perfect for small businesses and teams.

How long does production take?

Standard turnaround is 7-10 business days. We also offer rush services for 3-5 days and urgent service for 1-2 days.

Do you ship across Canada?

Yes! We ship nationwide from our Toronto location. Shipping costs are calculated based on order size and destination.

What file formats do you accept?

We accept JPG, PNG, PDF, AI, and EPS files. Vector formats are preferred for embroidery. We also offer digitizing services.

Can I see a sample before full production?

Yes! We create samples for approval before starting full production to ensure you're happy with the results.

Do you offer pickup in Toronto?

Yes, local pickup is available by appointment. This can save on shipping costs for Toronto-area customers.

Jiffyprints

Professional embroidery and custom printing services in Toronto. Fast turnaround, quality guaranteed, low minimums starting at 6 items.
